title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Khan Academy AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Khan Academy AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Khan Academy AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Khan Academy AI
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2026 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Khan Academy AI (generative ai) is Khan Academy AI is a non-profit educational platform that leverages artificial intelligence to provide personalized, mastery-based learning experiences. Its key capabilities include adaptive exercises, real-time progress tracking, and an AI-powered tutoring assistant (Khanmigo) that offers step-by-step guidance and Socratic dialogue. It uniquely serves a global audience of students, teachers, and parents with a completely free core curriculum, distinguishing it from commercial adaptive learning platforms.. Users choose it for adaptive-learning, k-12-education, ai-tutoring.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Khan Academy AI: AI-powered tutor (Khanmigo) for interactive, conversational guidance in math, science, and humanities, Adaptive practice exercises that adjust difficulty based on student performance, Mastery-based progress tracking with detailed skill dashboards

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Khan Academy AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Khan Academy AI for adaptive-learning.
